title: Bootstrap Forms
subject: Bootstrap
theory:
## User Input
Bootstrap provides extensive styling for form controls.

### Key Classes
* `.form-control`: The standard text input style (100% width, nice border).
* `.form-label`: Proper spacing for labels.
* `.form-select`: Styled dropdowns.
* `.form-check`: Wrapper for checkboxes/radios.

### Layout
Wrap labels and inputs in a div with `.mb-3` to space them out.

practice_problems.problem: Create a login form with Email and Password.
practice_problems.hint: Two inputs with form-control, one button.

exam_notes: Inputs are block level by default.
Use readonly or disabled logic attributes.
summary: Bootstrap forms normalize input rendering across browsers and make them touch-friendly.
